channel.title: Packing and Unpacking Files
channel.description:
Hey i need to know how to pack and unpack files..can anyone give me a little tut on how to do this please/thankyou you can pm me if you dont want others to know this :P
like in my npc folder theres packedDrops.d and the extention is .d but idk of anything on how to unpack and re pack them so i can edit them. i've tried 7zip, win.rar and HjSplit but there must be another way please help.
Will Repp++

item.title: Packing and Unpacking Files
item.dc:creator: @kingcobra805 kingcobra805
item.description:
@kingcobra805 wrote:

i tried opening with notepad and it all looks like this

a guy on rune-server released stuff unpacked for the base im using so i know you can unpack them but idk how…

and also id need to repack them wouldnt i?

Read full topic

item.title: Packing and Unpacking Files
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

packedDrops.d is probably not an archive. Try opening it with regular notepad. If you don’t get English results, it’s probably in a format which you won’t be able to read. Sorry, I’m not the best with file formats.

Read full topic

item.title: Packing and Unpacking Files
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

Maybe it’s just a file with an unneeded extension, try simply opening it with notepad. Or even maybe paint, sometimes an image is hidden in a fake extension… Try notepad first

Read full topic
